Articles.Content: Using smileys in your text is cheating. CHEATER, CHEATER, CHEATER, CHEATER, CHEATER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Howabout... if we call all of us... even you, even me... CHEATER?
A kerbal version of Old Ironsides? Clearly cheating as there is no wind on Kerbin. Round here we don't use the free energy of the wind, we burn combustibles to get anywhere.
Cheater because you do not believe in hydro power.
Penguins don't meep! Unless they use cheat codes of-course...
Stupidity and Fingers in your profile is cheating, you cheater!
New kerbal emoticons? You must lie awake in bed regretting your cheating ways. The forum supplied emoticons should be enough for any poster.
People rarely say their actual location in time zone, so you must have CHEATED to do it!
speaking about time zone is cheating, time is universal @ all scale and whatever
How do you wink all Kerbals? Let me guess... cheating?
What? Considering jebediah a type of science? What a cheater! Everybody knows that jebediah is a way of life.
Plural user name? Pretty sure there's only one of you, cheater. Around here users are individuals, not groups.
Assuming the s at the end of my name makes it plural? Cheater! What about Charles? James? Chris? All real players know not to assume things, to only know things. Get your facts right!

If you liked what I said, or are just feeling nice, don't be scared to leave me some rep!

Asking for reputation?

That's what I call...

Cheating.

Edited July 25, 2014 by mrrpamplemousse
Assuming I was interpreting the "s" as plural rather than "men"? Follow your own rules there, cheater.
Using big red letters is prohibited! You are a CHEATER!!!!!!
You just got ninja'd and didn't edited your post? This is cheating!

Well, actually, mrrpamplemousse ninja'd red iron crown in response to me, and lundmunchkins was responding to mrrpamplemousse, whom nobody had responded to yet, so lundmunchkins did not in fact get ninja'd.

Faulty accusations? Man, that's some real cheating right there. The best thing for you would be to join us non-cheaters and live a nice, peaceful, cheat-lacking life.
Thinking you're the arbiter of who ninja'd whom? Come down off your high horse, cheater. Ninjas answer to no one.
Your location is in a HALF HOUR TIME ZONE?! CHEATER!!!!
Spreading your stuck in the mud fetish via gifs and youtube links? Cheating in the first degree. Good posters don't impose their muddy fantasies on others.
You're a RED Iron Crown? Good people have just regular iron crowns! CHEATER!
How can you be posting this if you're stuck in mud? Cheater.
In response to your question, I don't know if you ever heard of being able to access the internet using cell service. Not knowing that is clearly CHEATING! CHEATER!
Wireless internet? That's some newfangled cheating there. If wires were good enough for Morse and Bell they should be good enough for you.
